Again, not believing everything people tell me is not calling them a liar. =
It is wanting to hold out judgment, either way, until I can find some proof=
 for myself.=C2=A0 Which is what I am trying to do here, reading the group,=
 and running tests.

One test is to catalog predictions, and measure result=
s.=C2=A0=C2=A0 The prediction was posted by Frank, so that is how I catalog=
 it.=C2=A0 That is not making insults.

his group have gotten during their sessions. If you listen to them, the res=
ults are there. The members of this group are giving you the evidence to li=
sten .=C2=A0
As an example, Frank related the contents of a session . I don=
't recall him calling that information a personal prediction of his, yet yo=
u said you were writing that down as one of his predictions. =C2=A0Please d=
o not insult others and then be =C2=A0surprised when people are offended.
